text: Stadio Nereo Rocco is a football stadium in Trieste, Italy. It is currently the home of Triestina, named after former player and manager Nereo Rocco. The stadium holds 21,000. Cagliari played their final home games of the 2011–12 Serie A season at the ground, due to restoration of their Stadio Sant'Elia. ==References== Venue Nereo Rocco Category:Buildings and structures in Trieste Category:Sports venues in Friuli-Venezia Giulia
title: Stadio Nereo Rocco
